text: Sofia Stanislavovna Pozdniakova (, born 17 June 1997) is a Russian sabre fencer. She is a two-time World champion (winning the individual event in 2018 and the team event in 2019).2019 World Fencing Championships ranking Sofia is the daughter of Stanislav Pozdnyakov who is a 4-time Olympic champion, 10-time World champion and 13-time European champion in the sabre competition, as well as the President of the Russian Olympic Committee (since 2018). ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Russian sabre fencers Category:Russian female fencers Category:Sportspeople from Novosibirsk
title: Sofia Pozdniakova
